nodes.text: "Han and Leia" is a musical track composed by John Williams, that represents the relationship between Han Solo and Leia Organa in the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. It first plays when Han and Leia see one another on Takodana for the first time in many years, and continues into the Resistance base on D'Qar.

The track includes themes from past films, including "Binary Sunset" and "Princess Leia's Theme" from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and "Han Solo and the Princess" from Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. It also includes a lighter versions of tracks from The Force Awakens, including "March of the Resistance" and the theme for Kylo Ren introduced in "Main Title and The Attack on the Jakku Village."
